log_to_xlsx_input.log_file_name: Your log file to be run
log_to_xlsx_input.log_file_path: Set to your storage location. If blank, uses the file path of the sample data. NOTE: file paths need // as separators.
log_to_xlsx_input.excel_data_file_path: Destination for the generated excel data. If blank, creates folder in the current directory
log_to_xlsx_input.flight_number: Flight number on the date specified

flight_log_generator_input.template_file_path: If blank, finds the default template location
flight_log_generator_input.template_file_name: If blank, uses the default template
flight_log_generator_input.arduino_flight_data_name: Name of correctly formatted Arduino data. If blank, uses the name of the sample data
flight_log_generator_input.arduino_flight_data_file_path: Path to arduino data. If blank, finds the path to the sample data
flight_log_generator_input.checklist_data_file_path: If blank, uses the sample checklist file path
flight_log_generator_input.metar_file_path: METAR data collected will be stored here. If blank, creates folder in the current directory
flight_log_generator_input.flight_log_destination: Destination for the generated flight logs. If blank, creates folder in the current directory

weather_data.Action_time_hh:mm: Time the weather data was recorded as hh:mm
weather_data.Temperature_C: Temperature recorded on the ground in celsius
weather_data.Wind_speed_mps: Wind speed recorded in meters per second (mps)
weather_data.Wind_direction_degrees: Wind direction recorded in degrees from North

runway_data.take_off_direction: This should be entered in degrees with North being 0.
runway_data.runway_surface: What material is the runway? E.g. tarmac/concrete/grass/dirt/ect.
runway_data.surface_condition: What condition is the runway in? E.g. dry/wet/icy/dusty/damaged/ect.
